data.text: @Cupcake7110 Hi there, sorry to learn that this has happened. Can you please send us a DM with your order number, confirm the name on the order and the first line of the billing address? So we can assist you further. - Sarah
@Cupcake7110 Hi there, I am sorry to hear this, please can you email all the details to our dedicated team at heretohelp@debenhams.com so we can look in to - Mikey
